content:
Hello,
I am trying to perform $subsumes operation on HAPI FHIR Server, where codeA and codeB are same. The result should be "equivalent" as per the concept-subsumption-outcome but I get "not-subsumed" as the result.

GET [base]/CodeSystem/$subsumes?system=http://snomed.info/sct&codeA=3738000&codeB=3738000
Response:
{
"resourceType": "Parameters",
"parameter": [
{
"name": "outcome",
"valueCode": "not-subsumed"
}
]
}

Can someone help?
Thanks in advance
